fxInfo_label: Share of population with suffrage ordinal
fxInfo_clarification: These are ordinalized versions of the V-Dem share of population with suffrage. The original index ranges from 0 to 1. These transformations offer three different ordinal versions with three (_3C), four (_4C), and five (_5C) levels respectively.
fxInfo_question: What share of adult citizens (as defined by statute) has the legal right to vote in national elections?
name: e_v2x_suffr_3C /_4C /_5C
